reviewText: One of the original episodes for BMI available to English speaking countries.  Great addition for the collector.  Mine arrived with some scratches on the DVD, but still played fine.
Great video!!! I recommend it to all EVO fanatics. If you're an sti fan then it's hard to watch with you're eyes open or ears for that matter. Big up to best motoRING. we need more videos like this!

Great DVD for any Evo fan out there trying to build up their collection on Lancer Evo related DVD.  This DVD shows a great showdown btwn Rally Evo VII, a stock Evo VIII GSR, and a current Evo VIII race car, to show the comparison in performance on Tsukuba.
